name: Fettucine Alfredo

name: Primavera Pasta
description: An emulsified sauce of basil, pine nuts and cream added to bow-tie pasta with mixed veggies for a refreshing taste.

name: Tiramisu
description: A classic dessert made with real coffee

name: Al Pastor Tacos
description: Marinated for hours and cooked to perfection

name: Chicken Fajita Tacos
description: Your classic grilled-chicken taste paired with flour tortilla and peppers

name: Chicken Flautas
description: Crispy fried texture on the outside and cheesy insides

name: Cheeseburger
description: Can't go wrong with this American classic: served with pickles, tomatoes, and lettuce

name: Hot Dog
description: Options to add ketchup, mustard, relish, and more
